abstract: The brewer’s promise to find $550 million of new cost savings by 2020 looks paltry in the context of a huge takeover offer from Anheuser-Busch InBev.
snippet: The brewer’s promise to find $550 million of new cost savings by 2020 looks paltry in the context of a huge takeover offer from Anheuser-Busch InBev.
lead_paragraph: SABMiller’s promise to find $550 million in new cost savings by 2020 is paltry in the context of the huge takeover approach from Anheuser-Busch InBev. SAB might have more powerful defenses in its locker. It had better, if it wants to stay independent from the Budweiser brewer.
